title: Matchmaking is "Balanced"...
body: Getting pretty sick of this to be honest...

replies.body:
lol one ward.
The problem is, as HeartVine mentioned, normal matches have nothing to do with ranked MMR. That is how people defend this, but it is also the issue.
Riot really needs to make ranked MMR influence normal MMR, even if it is not a 1:1 ratio, as there are a lot of players who play like 90% of their games as ranked games.
Normal matches have ***NOTHING*** to do with ranked MMR.

ive had stuff like that in ranked

last ranked game i played i was mid and our bot lane was unranked versing a gold adc and silver supp

maybe they were duo with someone else but i dont know how unranked was versing was put in a silver-gold ranked match
